DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the feasibility of using the internet and in-home computers to provide advice from health care professionals, social support, and health information to people with schizophrenia and their families.
DOC.brief_title: Web-based Support for People With Schizophrenia and Their Families
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this study is to assess the feasibility of using the World Wide Web (Web) and in-home computers to provide patients suffering from schizophrenia and their families advice from health care professionals, social support, and information. The purposes of this intervention are to improve: 1) the availability, convenience and use of needed mental health services; 2) family support for their ill family members; and 3) patient and family outcomes.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of schizophrenia Able to speak and read English Regular contact with a family member Enrolled in another study
